com.frc2013.rmr662.system.generic

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.frc2013.rmr662.system.generic.Component
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DemoComponent

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Thread
    Represents a component of the robot. Subclasses should implement update(). Subclasses can also override onBegin() and/or onEnd() as desired.
    Author:
    Dan Mercer

      Deprecated.

        public final void end()

      • onBegin

        protected void onBegin()
        Called when the Component begins. Override this to do something here.

      • onEnd

        protected void onEnd()
        Called before the Component ends. Override this to do something here.

      • update

        protected abstract void update()
        Called repeatedly while the component is enabled. This method is called in a synchronized block (synchronized on this Component).
